My name is Josh Martin and I'm a product designer based in Chicago

Currently, I am freelancing full-time and building with no.nonsense. Previously, I was Creative Director at ThreadMeUp and Lead UI/UX Engineer at Chicago Sun‑Times. A write-up of all my work experience is available on Linkedin.

If you would like to work together, contact me via email and/or view my resume.
